name: Leg extensions
description: Perform leg extensions by sitting on a leg extension machine with your feet under the padded bar. Extend your legs until they are straight, engaging your quadriceps. Slowly return to the starting position to complete one repetition

name: Bicep Curls
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell with an underhand grip, arms extended down. Curl the barbell towards your shoulders, keeping elbows close to your body. Lower the barbell back down with control.
